author: Mika Richmond
comment: I really like it but my highlight doesn't work and there is a search button that doesn't work as well. If these 2 options worked on my Huawei 2 sport watch I'd give it a 5

author: Josh Hymer
comment: That's pretty cool that's exactly what I was looking for but the search function is not working. That would be sweet if it did that's why I only 3 stars.
